prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Vietnamese. 

Correct speech recognition errors and inconsistencies based on context.

Note that the original timestamps should be PRESERVED for each entry.

PLEASE DON'T CHANGE ORIGINAL TIMESTAMPS.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:00,280",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "Okay."
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:01,282",
    "end": "00:00:02,021",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "这是狐狸犬"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:07,074",
    "end": "00:00:07,914",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "Oh I will have to once a week just to hammer in some nuts."
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:07,914",
    "end": "00:00:08,654",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "you"
  }
]

Output JSON format only:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "vi": "Vietnamese text"
  }
]
```

response.vi: Ồ, tôi sẽ phải làm việc này một lần mỗi tuần để đóng vào một số hạt.
